body.name: Proactiv Acne Cleanser - Benzoyl Peroxide Face Wash and Acne Treatment - Daily Facial Cleanser and Hyularonic Acid Moisturizer with Exfoliating Beads - 90 Day Supply, 6 Oz
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 11 mins
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 11 mins
features: YOU NEED MORE THAN A PIMPLE CREAM - Proactiv Solution is a powerful, comprehensive acne treatment that treats irritated skin, removes impurities and helps prevent future flare ups. This medicated cleanser is the first step toward fresher, clearer skin.

ACNE SKIN CARE DOESN'T MEAN YOU'RE STUCK WITH DULL, DRY SKIN - Proactiv Renewing Cleanser contains hyaluronic acid, which helps maintain skin hydration. Combine with a hydrating face moisturizer to keep your face feeling as great as it looks.
EVERYONE DESERVES A SOLUTION - Proactiv's Renewing Cleanser is safe and effective skin care for teens and adults and can be used on all skin types.
BECAUSE IT WORKS - Your days of applying acne spot treatment cream and crossing your fingers is over. Proactiv's Renewing Cleanser won't just treat today; it treats your everyday.

FROM THE COMPANY THAT STARTED A SKINCARE REVOLUTION - Designed specifically for acne-prone skin, Proactiv Solution delivers finely-milled benzoyl peroxide deep into your pores to help stop acne in its tracks and prevent new breakouts.
body.description: This acne-fighting facial cleanser washes away excess oil, dirt and other impurities. It removes dead skin cells with tiny, smooth exfoliating beads. Micronized benzoyl peroxide used in this face wash is designed to quickly penetrate deep into pores to start to kill acne-causing on contact. The combination of cleansing and exfoliating helps to clear up existing acne blemishes and prevent new ones from forming.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Proactiv Solution - For oily or combo skin Oli Controlling - For mild to moderate acne THE ORIGINAL ACNE KIT THAT STARTED A SKINCARE REVOLUTION - Designed specifically for acne-prone skin, Proactiv Solution delivers finely-milled benzoyl peroxide deep into your pores to help stop acne-causing bacteria in its tracks and prevent breakouts.YOU NEED MORE THAN A PIMPLE CREAM - Proactiv Solution is a powerful, comprehensive acne treatment system that goes deep into your pores, removes impurities and helps prevent future flare ups.YOUR SKIN ROUTINE, MADE EASY - Just 3 steps a day gets you on your way to clear, radiant skin.SAFE FOR DIFFERENT AGES AND SKIN TYPES - Proactiv's 3-Step Kit provides the same powerful skin care for teens and adults, and is great for sensitive skin. Proactiv Clean - For sensitive skin Gentle - For mild acne & occasional breakouts Introducing Proactiv Clean, a cleaner, gentler approach for mild acne skin care & occasional breakouts- Non-comedogenic and proactively formulated without parabens, phthalates, sulfates, cyclic silicones & 100+ no-no ingredients.The Proactiv Clean 3-Step Acne Treatment Routine skin care set is perfect for adults and teens with sensitive skin, formulated with gentler yet proven acne-clearing ingredients like mineral-derived sulfur and salicylic acid to help clear blemishes, and skin-loving ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, bakuchiol & chamomile to help smooth texture, even skin tone and calm irritated skin.includes the Mineral Acne Cleanser to gently wash away excess dirt & oil for that clean skin feeling, the Azelaic Pore Perfector to help decongest pores and helps to visibly improve skin’s tone and radiance, and the Acne Clearing Hydrator to nourish and help improve skin’s texture. Proactiv+ - For dry skin Hydrating - For mild to moderate acne CLEAR SKIN DOESN'T HAVE TO MEAN DRY SKIN: If your acne face wash is making your skin dry or dull, Proactiv was made specifically with you in mind. This acne treatment system prevents flare ups while promoting glowing, healthy skin.YOU NEED MORE THAN A PIMPLE CREAM: Proactiv is a powerful, comprehensive acne treatment that refreshes skin, removes impurities and helps prevent future breakouts.ILLUMINATE YOUR SKIN: Our salicylic acid complexion treatment is a powerful moisture complex to keep your skin ultra-hydrated.SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES AND SKIN TYPES: Proactiv's 3-Step Kit provides the same powerful skin care for teens and adults, and is great for sensitive skin.

Proactiv 3 Step Acne Treatment Proactiv Clean 3 Step Acne Treatment Routine Proactiv+ 3 Step Advanced Skincare Acne Treatment Product Benefits Proactiv has a complete line of products beyond the 3-Step System, including acne, moisturizer, hydrating moisturizers, sunscreens, acne spot treatments and acne body washes, all formulated specifically for acne prone skin. You want clear skin but feel like most acne fighting formulas contain harsh ingredients that cause dryness or irritation. This clean and gentle 3-step routine helps clear blemishes, while smoothing and helping to calm the skin. Proactiv+ is a 3-Step Acne Treatment System with advanced skin care benefits that delivers even more medicine to the pores for faster results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars been using this product since I was 21 years old, I am now 51.
reviews.reviewText: great product. every time I try something different on my face, it immedicately breaks out and this products cleaned up my face within a week. will never wash my face with nothing else but proactive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works like the commercial says
reviews.reviewText: Works like the commercial says. Nothing really left, I'm over 60, still get some acne. This is more mild than the stuff for the young ones. That said, they claim the lower benzyl peroxide is better for young skin because it's less drying'

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Large bottle!! I wish the date of expiration was longer.I typically make it last several months.Hopefully by 5/24 it will be at the end

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for certain people
reviews.reviewText: My daughter uses Proactiv each and every day. She tried multiple products, but none would keep away the breakouts. I'm so happy we found these products. They may not be for everyone, but they do work for some. I never really had issues with breakouts, so it was hard to find products to work for my daughter. We tried lots (some $, others $$$), and now we found a product to stick with! Again, not suitable for all skin types, but if you've tried everything else, give this a shot!

reviews.reviewTitle: Exactly what I wanted at the right price and on time
reviews.reviewText: Thank you, exactly what I wanted.
Exactly what I ordered in exactly the short amount of time it said.
Proactiv is great for my skin, so I was happy to find the cleanser at a reasonable price. When I opened it the expiry date was less than 6 months. Amazon was happy to give me a refund.
